Sheriff.name: Sheriff
Sheriff.description:
Each day you get to vote in an attempt to remove the Mafia from the community.

You have no special abilities.
You win with the Town
You must kill the Witch
You must kill the Mafia
You must kill the Serial Killer
You may spare anyone else
Sheriff.label: required

Random Town.name: A random town member
Random Town.description: Uniqueness here determens the max value of how many of the random townies are allowed to roll as citizen
Random Town.label: multiple

Godfather.name: Godfather
Godfather.description:
You are in the Mafia.

Each night you may talk with the other Mafia members in the Mafia chat, and decide which of you will perform the Factional Kill, and who to kill.
You are Night Immune.
You will appear as Innocent to all investigative roles (eg. Sheriff).
Godfather.label: required

custom.text: Click this to add a custom message.

reset.text: Reset the content of this message

controlled.text: You got controlled by a Witch last night.

mafia_kill.text: You got killed by the Mafia last night.

sk_kill.text: You got killed by the Serial Killer last night

immune.text: Your target was immune to your attack.

bodyguarded.text: Your target was protected by the Bodyguard and you were killed by them last night.

yes.text:
